[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [URITemplate](./format.uritemplate.md)

## URITemplate class

The URITemplate formatter based on RFC 6570.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class URITemplate 
```

## Example 1


```ts
URITemplate.parse("https://api.example.com/users/{userId}/posts/{postId}")
// {
//   text: "https://api.example.com/users/{userId}/posts/{postId}",
//   expressions: new Set([{ ... }]),
// }
```

## Example 2


```ts
URITemplate.parse("/search{?q,page,limit}")
// {
//   text: "/search{?q,page,limit}",
//   expressions: new Set([{ ... }]),
// }
```

## Example 3


```ts
URITemplate.parse("{/path*}/resource")
// {
//   text: "{/path*}/resource",
//   expressions: new Set([{ ... }]),
// }
```
